preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored Update for MAX_DECELERATION, MAX_ACCELERATION, MAX_FWD_SPEED, MAX_REV_SPEED, MIN_TURN_RADIUS to table MACHINE_TYPE as table or columns do not exist.

changeSet.comment: AHS-13357: Update MACHINE_TYPE non-zero performance values
changeSet.sql: UPDATE MACHINE_TYPE SET MAX_DECELERATION = 0, MAX_ACCELERATION = 0, MAX_FWD_SPEED = 0, MAX_REV_SPEED = 0, MIN_TURN_RADIUS = 0 WHERE IS_INFRASTRUCTURE = 1 AND (MAX_DECELERATION > 0 OR MAX_ACCELERATION > 0 OR MAX_FWD_SPEED > 0 OR MAX_REV_SPEED > 0 OR MIN_TURN_RADIUS > 0)
